decrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.details: Decrements referral credits for a given referrer.

params.artistCredits: Number of artist credits to remove.
params.organizerCredits: Number of organizer credits to remove.
params.referrer: The address of the referrer whose credits are to be decremented.
params.venueCredits: Number of venue credits to remove.

getReferralCredits(address).details: Retrieves the referral credits for a specified address.

params.referrer: The address to retrieve referral credits for.

returns._0: The referral credits of the specified address.

incrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.details: Increments referral credits for a given referrer.

params.artistCredits: Number of artist credits to add.
params.organizerCredits: Number of organizer credits to add.
params.referrer: The address of the referrer whose credits are to be incremented.
params.venueCredits: Number of venue credits to add.

setCreditControlPermission(address,bool).details: Sets or revokes permission for an address to decrement referral credits.

params.contractAddress: The address to update permission for.
params.permission: True to allow, false to revoke.
